recipe_name: No-churn blueberry and lemon ice cream
method: Place the blueberries in a food processor or blender with the yoghurt, icing sugar, lemon rind and juice and process until smooth. Spoon the mixture into a freezer-proof container and freeze. When the mixture is softly frozen and easily spoonable, serve with a few blueberries and a sprinkling of icing sugar.
